post.body: RT... RobertFischer So. Many. Ideas. Need time. - That's cuz the Net has created permanent time warp. We don't ever NOT need.
big LOL. btw one of my favs is the DM's w/ the link about their mlm
Yes I so agree. 2000 was the last we were all together... and now Mom is gone, and so is my sister. Revel in today's gathering!
This doesn't appear to be working... signing in and it just returns to the home page...
"refrain from detailed descriptions of tastes, textures, etc" ... lol! thank you "-)
Thanks for the follow! Loved your pics! Would love to talk over your expat adventure.. and love your 'not for dummies' statement!
Hi James and thanks for the follow; I am honored :-) .. hope your Christmas is peaceful and bright.
Family.. all are far away. I'm celebrating the reason for the season, faith is bountiful. Echoes of memories. And love abounds.
RT: Quote of the Day: "At Christmas, all roads lead home." - Marjorie Holmes - Even if only in our hearts.
Well tweeples, time to say g'night. Am going to actually try and work on my blog!
Just finished putting up my info for Facebook. lol, these things feel like you are filling out a job app! http://tr.im/2nws
Had a very freezy picnic in the park with friends, but Fun! And thanks to John who fixed my door... those awful winds last night.
Just signed up with new (to me) monetization program... Infolinks. Anybody with them? http://infolinks.com/ - note the GOOGLE search ??
New blog post: Your Goals - Real growth occurs when you leave your comfort zone http://tinyurl.com/9uycue
Anyone else having trouble with these twitter tools? I can't get them working. Is 'overload' a problem? Too many twitterers, need to upgrade
Who would have thot? A great bread recipe from my Bum Marketer mentor ... I will try this, Beer Bread... http://tr.im/2myw
Good morning my twitter world! My heartfelt wishes for a wonderful Christmas, full of all the best for today and for our upcoming 2009!
I'm setting up a Tumblr page; mixed reaction. Great template to showcase artworks. But..does Tumblr always move this slowly?
Dear friends stopped by unexpectedly, bringing lasagna and holiday goodies from their "Eve" supper. God bless them, and all of you too!
Such energy in the morning air! Will you trade a blog review for a copy of my Christmas children's eBook creation? http://tr.im/2m7d - DM me
